remarks: Properties of a pair of functions to be a path between two given vertices(in an undirected graph).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Nov-2017.)
statement: ispthon $p |- ( ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) /\ ( F e. W /\ P e. Z ) /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) ) -> ( F ( A ( V PathOn E ) B ) P <-> ( F ( A ( V WalkOn E ) B ) P /\ F ( V Paths E ) P ) ) ) $.
